title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 606.14 - Procedure to amend faculty council regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 606.14 - Procedure to amend faculty council regulations

State Regulations
(a) Proposed amendments of this Part may be
recommended to the board of trustees of the university by a two-thirds vote of
those faculty delegates present, but in no case shall the total number of
confirming votes cast be less than 50 percent of the member community
colleges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
606.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
